attributes.action: Insist that Carlisle (Cumbria) Is on the route for new high speed rail link
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It make the goverment insist that cumbria is on the stoppin list for the new high speed rail link. and not cut off from having a stop on the line meaning cumbrians would have to travel in excess of 100 miles to get to rail link

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
